alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 3:30PM EST until January 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Hatteras Island, Ocracoke Island and Northern Outer Banks. * WHEN...Until early this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island
